ingredients: 1 TBSP milk(can substitute almond or oat milk)
instructions: Preheat oven to 250, line cookie sheet with parchment paper
Beat butter and sugae together until light and fluffy
Mix flour, baking soda, and salt together
Scrap the sides of the bowl with butter and salt. Slowyl add the flour mixutre, add the milk and mix until ti start to come together
Using the cookie scoop scoop cookie batter on cookie sheet, placing them about 2 inches apart until tray is full.
Place parchment paper on top of cookie balls, take the 2nd backing tray and press down to fallent cookies to about 1/5 of an inch.
Place in over and back for 12 minutes, turning halfway through
